name: Bubble Popper (Riegel25)
description:
Riegelsoft Bubble Popper

for Low Effort Jam 24

Click or touch to pop the bubbles! Clear as many as you can in thirty seconds.  Be careful though! If they escape to the top, you lose a point!

Version 3 released:

  • Added support to right-click the bubbles.

Version 2 released:

  • Added some variety to popping sound effects.
  • Prevented bubbles from spawning on the very right side of the game canvas.
